name: Taudaha Lake Naga
shortLoreBlurb: Taudaha Lake Naga is a spirit from Nepal tied to lake serpent, guardian. Serpents mark liminal borders and cyclical power. Appeased for safe travel and rains.

description: Taudaha Lake Naga is a spirit from Nepal tied to lake serpent, guardian. Serpents mark liminal borders and cyclical power. Appeased for safe travel and rains.
